sections.heading: Judge Advocate; appointment.The Adjutant General shall appoint as State Judge Advocate one of the Senior Staff Judge Advocates from either the Army National Guard or the Air National Guard

sections.text:
55-407.State Judge Advocate; appointment.

The Adjutant General shall appoint as State Judge Advocate one of the Senior Staff Judge Advocates from either the Army National Guard or the Air National Guard.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 7, p. 1555.
